title: Cloud Native and Open Source Help Scale Agentic AI Workflows
author: Sanjay Basu
description: Small language models (SLMs) paired with Kubernetes and Function as a Service (FaaS) have emerged as alternatives to LLMs for agentic AI use cases.
cntitle: 云原生和开源助力扩展 Agentic AI 工作流
cndescription: 小型语言模型 (SLM) 与 Kubernetes 和函数即服务 (FaaS) 结合使用，已成为 Agentic AI 用例中 LLM 的替代方案。
